name: I'm in love with a potato visual novel dating sim
name_original: I'm in love with a potato visual novel dating sim
description:
The game that literally no one asked for but is here nonetheless.

Capture Potato-chan's heart in this pulse-pounding, seat-throttling, earth-shaking action RPG which features over 5 unique endings!

Once you get an ending / game over, please refresh the page.
